title: NextEra Energy Intends to Sell $1.5 Billion of Equity Units
text:
By Josh Beckerman

NextEra Energy Inc. (NEE) plans to sell $1.5 billion of equity units, which will include contracts to buy common stock in the future and ownership interests in a NextEra Energy Capital Holdings Inc. debenture.

Each unit will be issued in a stated amount of $50.

NextEra, whose operations include Florida Power & Light, said proceeds will be added to the general funds of NextEra Energy Capital Holdings for purposes including funding energy and power project investments.

Write to Josh Beckerman at josh.beckerman@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

September 04, 2019 18:09 ET (22:09 GMT)
